thread.section_title: Inkfarm.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Inkfarm.com | www.inkfarm.com | 2 of 806
thread.title: bummed out

author: bummed out
title: bummed out
text: The order arrived very promptly. However, the ink I got lasted me only about two weeks. I don't print a lot of volume...I usually replace ink ever 4-6 weeks. However, this ran out within two weeks, right in the middle of an important project. I will not be buying recycled or generic ink (or whatever it's called) ever again. It seemed to good to be true but I fell for it. I'm back to buying the expensive Brother ink.
